summary.title: Advanced Network Architectures
summary.description: This course teaches students how to implement, monitor, deploy and maintain a network in a converged enterprise environment. Students will learn how to plan, configure, and verify the implementation of complex enterprise switching solutions. The course also covers the secure integration of VLANs, WLANs, voice, and video into networks. Comprehensive labs emphasize hands-on learning and practice to reinforce the skills learned in class.

laboratory-studio-outcomes.summary: In the laboratory the students gain valuable hands-on exposure to Cisco equipment. They are able to practice setting up configurations exercising the topics discussed during lecture. Students work in teams and are encouraged to collaborate and coordinate in setting up the lab network archietctures each week. Students work in the new CIS laboratories.
